metadata.title: CVE-2018-14652 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Gluster file system through versions 3.12 and 4.1.4 is vulnerable to abuffer overflow in the 'features/index' translator via the code handlingthe 'GF_XATTR_CLRLK_CMD' xattr in the 'pl_getxattr' function. A remoteauthenticated attacker could exploit this on a mounted volume to cause adenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14652` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-client - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm1
glusterfs-common - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm1
glusterfs-server - 3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.6-1ubuntu1+esm1').
